about_the_game:
Mission brief:

You are deployed to a heavily guarded compound to infiltrate and extract a highly valuable relic. Remaining undetected is of utmost priority. If anyone spots you, the mission is over. Use your surroundings carefully to avoid detection and reach the vault. The ultimate test of strategy and patience awaits you. Harder challenges will become available for the elite who accomplish their extraction.

Do you accept your mission?

Infiltrate and Extract will test your problem solving and decision-making skills. This game has no mercy against those who don’t plan ahead, and heavy punishments for not being patient. Only the best of agents returns home, and the very best can beat the hardest challenges the game has to offer. Are you up for the challenge?



  • 10 unique locations.
  • Unlockable “First Person” Mode.
  • Unlockable “Sudden Death” Mode.
  • Est. Mission length: ~ 1 hour.




This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

name: Infiltrate & Extract

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A top-down 3D stealth game where remaining undetected is of utmost priority. Take down security guards and stay in the shadows to reach the vault and extract a highly valuable relic.
